MC2String UTF8Util::cleanUtf8 (  const MC2String &  instr,
bool  reportConversions = false
)  [static]
 

Converts a string that can be utf-8 or latin-1 into utf-8.

Does this by assuming that all invalid combinations are latin-1.

Parameters:
reportConversions Set this to true to get a print of each invalid UTF-8 sign.

char* UTF8Util::isoToUtf8 (  char *  destMustBeTwiceAsBigAsSrcPlusZeroTerm,
const char *  src,
int *  outlen = NULL,
int *  inlen = NULL
)  [static]
 

Writes utf-8 encoded string into already allocated string.

The destination must be twice as large as the strlen of src plus 1.

Parameters:
destMustBeTwiceAsBigAsSrcPlusZeroTerm Destination.
src Source.
outlen If not NULL the number of characters written will be placed here.
inlen If not NULL this number will be used instead of running strlen.
Returns:
Ptr to destMustBeTwiceAsBigAsSrcPlusZeroTerm.

char* UTF8Util::isoToUtf8 (  const char *  str,
int *  outlen = NULL,
int *  inlen = NULL
)  [static]
 

Writes utf-8 encoded string into res from str ISO encoding.

Parameters:
str is the iso encoded string
outlen The length of the encoded string excluding zero termination. Optional.
inlen The length of the input string. Optional.
Returns:
New char* encoded in UTF8. Will be twice as long as the original.

Referenced by mc2ToUtf8().

int UTF8Util::unicodeToUtf8 (  uint32  unicode,
char *  utf8
)  [static]
 

Converts a unicode character to a utf-8 string.

The utf-8 string must be at least 7 characters long.

Parameters:
unicode The unicode character.
utf8 Destination string.
Returns:
Number of bytes added to utf8 excl zero term.
